item.title: Trump to ask DOJ to probe Jeffrey Epstein involvement with Clinton, JPMorgan, Summers
item.description: President Trump himself is a former longtime friend of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, who killed himself in a federal jail during Trump's first term.

item.title: Woman pleads guilty to lying about astronaut wife accessing bank account from Space Station
item.description: Summer Worden faces a possible maximum sentence of five years in prison in the case, which involves false allegations she made against astronaut Anne ...

item.title: U.S. and Switzerland reach trade deal to lower tariffs to 15%
item.description: Switzerland has been subject to one of the highest tariff rates levied on an individual country by the Trump administration.

item.title: Goldman Sachs stands by top lawyer Kathy Ruemmler after her emails with Jeffrey Epstein exposed
item.description: The email chats between top lawyer Kathy Ruemmler and Jeffrey Epstein came years after his guilty plea to sex crimes in Florida.

item.title: Government shutdown back pay headed to federal workers in coming days
item.description: President Donald Trump late Wednesday signed a funding bill that reopened the U.S. government for the first time since it shut down on Oct. 1.
